metadata.description: DISC-based communication strategies for report customization

communication_style.language: Strong action verbs, ROI-focused, competitive framing
communication_style.structure: Executive summary style, bullet points, minimal detail
communication_style.pacing: Fast, get to the point quickly
communication_style.emphasis: Bottom-line impact, competitive advantage, quick wins

executive_summary.focus: Key findings and immediate action items

phase_description.focus: What needs to be done and why it matters to results

recommendations.order: Highest impact first, quick wins highlighted
recommendations.detail_level: Minimal - just enough to take action

visual_preferences.charts: Simple bar charts showing results, minimal decoration
visual_preferences.layout: Clean, lots of white space, scannable

sample_phrases.opening: Here's what you need to know and do to drive results:
sample_phrases.recommendation: Implement this to gain {specific_benefit} and achieve {measurable_outcome}
sample_phrases.closing: Take action on these priorities to maximize your competitive advantage

phase_description.focus: Opportunities for growth and positive transformation

recommendations.format: Engaging titles, visual icons, collaborative framing
recommendations.order: Mix of quick wins and innovative ideas

visual_preferences.charts: Colorful, engaging visuals with icons and illustrations

sample_phrases.opening: Exciting news! Your assessment reveals tremendous opportunities to elevate your business:
sample_phrases.recommendation: Imagine the impact when you {action} - your team will {benefit} and you'll create {positive_outcome}
sample_phrases.closing: Together, we'll transform these insights into breakthrough results for your business!

executive_summary.focus: Clear path forward with support available

phase_description.focus: What to expect and how we'll support you through it

recommendations.format: Numbered steps, clear timelines, support noted

visual_preferences.charts: Simple, clear charts with gentle colors

sample_phrases.opening: Thank you for taking time with this assessment. Here's a clear path forward, and we're here to support you every step:
sample_phrases.recommendation: You can {action} by following these straightforward steps. We'll be with you throughout the process to ensure success
sample_phrases.closing: Take these at your own pace - we're here to support you whenever you need guidance

communication_style.emphasis: Accuracy, quality, systematic approach, data validation

visual_preferences.charts: Detailed charts with data labels, precise axes

sample_phrases.opening: Based on comprehensive analysis of your 44 assessment responses, here are the data-driven findings:
sample_phrases.recommendation: Analysis indicates that implementing {action} will yield {specific_metric} improvement based on {data_source}
sample_phrases.closing: All recommendations are supported by detailed analysis and industry benchmarks included in Appendix

balanced.description: No strongly dominant personality type - use moderate approach

communication_style.emphasis: Balance of results, process, data, and support

executive_summary.focus: Overview of findings and key recommendations

recommendations.detail_level: Moderate - enough to understand and act

sample_phrases.opening: Your Financial RISE Report reveals key insights about your business financial health:
sample_phrases.closing: These recommendations provide a clear path forward to strengthen your financial operations

DI.blend: Brief but engaging, ROI-focused with team emphasis
DI.strategy: Quick wins that involve team, competitive opportunities

DC.blend: Data-driven action items, ROI with supporting evidence

IS.blend: Team-focused with clear process, positive and patient

SC.blend: Methodical and detailed, systematic with thoroughness

client_report.note: DISC type is NEVER mentioned to client - only applied to customize communication
client_report.customization: Adapt language, detail level, structure, and visuals based on profile

consultant_report.note: Consultant sees DISC profile and receives coaching on how to communicate
consultant_report.customization: Includes communication coaching and talking points

fallback.condition: If DISC profile cannot be determined
fallback.strategy: Use 'balanced' approach with moderate detail and professional tone

strong_profile.threshold: Primary type score > 70% and score difference > 30%
strong_profile.approach: Strongly adapt to primary type preferences

dual_profile.threshold: Two types within 20% of each other and both > 50%

balanced_profile.threshold: No type > 60% or all types within 25% range
